id.description: Unique identifier for the client (generated from Date.now() or existing numeric ID converted to string)
Unique identifier for the inventory item (slugified name)

quantity.description: Current quantity of the item in stock

cost.description: Cost per unit of the item (internal cost)

rentalPrice.description: Rental price per unit of the item charged to clients

clientId.description: ID of the client who made the booking

eventName.description: Name of the event or service booked

items.description: JSON object of items booked, with item ID as key and quantity as value

price.description: Total price of the booking (negotiated client price)

paymentMethod.description: Payment method used (Pix, Credit Card, etc.)

paymentStatus.description: Status of the payment (Pendente, Pago, Parcial)

contractDataUrl.description: URL for the attached contract file (optional)

eventAddress.description: Address where the event will take place

observations.description: Any additional observations for the booking

database.instructions: This database manages clients, inventory, and event bookings for 'CS Aluguel de Mesa e Pula Pula'. Client IDs, booking IDs, and item IDs are stored as text. Bookings store `clientId` as text to link to client records. 'items' in bookings are stored as a JSONB object mapping inventory item IDs to quantities. 'cost' in inventory is the internal purchase cost, while 'rentalPrice' is the price charged to the client for rental.
